trigger_prototype.expression: avg(/Monitoramento - OLT Fiberhome AN5516-04 AN5516-06/cardCpuUtil[{#CARD}],300s)=0 and avg(/Monitoramento - OLT Fiberhome AN5516-04 AN5516-06/cardMenUtil[{#CARD}],300s)=0 and last(/Monitoramento - OLT Fiberhome AN5516-04 AN5516-06/cardType[{#CARD}]) and last(/Monitoramento - OLT Fiberhome AN5516-04 AN5516-06/slotIndex[{#CARD}])
trigger_prototype.name: Placa {ITEM.VALUE3} - {ITEM.VALUE4} sem consumo !

discovery_rule.name: ifDescr
discovery_rule.description:
You may also consider using IF-MIB::ifType or IF-MIB::ifAlias for discovery depending on your filtering needs.
{$SNMP_COMMUNITY} is a global macro.
